name: Path of Mage
description:
Path of Mage is a role playing game where you take control of a young sorceress, fighting her way through dungeons filled with skeletons and bosses! You start small from a simple Fireball and grow up to summoning Blizzards and Tornadoes.

Develop your abilities and defeat your enemies with your demolishing magic!

In order to access the full game you have to buy it. However, there is a demo available for free!

Check out the game trailer and overview in order to see what is this game all about.

Overview:

Can't decide? Try free Demo!

Recommended System Requirements:

  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics Card: GeForce GTX 970
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

If the game seems to be lagging, consider reducing the graphics quality when launching the game

Game feedback: gw1psupp@gmail.com

Twitter: @AntonGw1p

Icon picture by: J. W. Bjerk (eleazzaar) - http://opengameart.org/content/painterly-spell-ico...

Thank you! I hope you enjoy it.
